price: 92. Maar als hij (de persoon die sterft) tot de dwalende verloochenaars behoort.
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
